target: S "Hey, Guardian! Now that I've completed your task, I'm waiting for my reward."
"Sarah felt very pleased and proud when she said this. For her, the fight for the essence turned out to be more difficult than any other before, so the taste of victory was especially sweet."
G "It's yours, and I won't argue with that. But there is one unpleasant 'but'."
"Sarah looked at the guardian with displeasure, and he slowly backed away. After all that she had to go through for the sake of this essence, she didn't want to hear about any nuances."
"Lizzara, standing behind Sarah, was also outraged. She knew better than anyone what they had been through."
L "(But? What nonsense!)"
S "Where did you come from? You scared me."
L "Ah... well, I thought you might need my help..."
L "Yes, and I would be happy to finish this case together. Friends who start together, finish together, hee-hee, right?"
S "Yeah, of course, just don't sneak up on me..."
L "Oh, sorry. Indeed, I should have warned you in advance..."
G "Yes, I knew that you and... your friend, I guess, wouldn't be thrilled. However, I can't take anything back. You'll have to gather the essence yourself."
S "And what's so unpleasant about gathering it?"
G "Well..."
G "Come, I have to show you something."
S "(Damn, it's the same thing every time. Can't you just simply give me your essence...)"
S "Yes..."
L "W-what is this..."

"Sarah and Lizzara were standing in front of a small pool filled to the brim with semen. The smell was characteristic, but for some reason, it calmed the girl and directed her mood in a different direction. The same couldn't be said for Protoss. She was more frightened by this view than attracted."
L "He didn't seem to be lying..."
S "I'm afraid to even imagine why you need it..."

"Various vulgar and comical thoughts related to zerg and a bunch of thick liquid wormed their way into Sarah's head. Images of the guardian splashing around in the semen together with his best friends on a hot sunny day came to mind."
S "(What a pity it can't be true.)"
S "Heh..."
G "It's not what you might think."
S "What could I have thought of?"
G "I'm not..."
G "It doesn't matter."
"The girl watched with interest as the emotions on the guardian's face swiftly replaced each other."
S "(Interesting, they are all covered in a thick layer of chitin, but their confusion is still so easy to notice.)"
S "I can agree that it doesn't matter."
S "So... Why are we here?"
"Sarah pointed to what she saw in front of her. She was genuinely interested in who and why they had come up with something like this in such a place."
S "Is this something sophisticated for training new slaves?"
"Lizzara shuddered as she heard these words.She could easily imagine herself being dipped into the pool. Or worse."
S "It had to be Mistress' idea..."
G "No, not quite... This hefty tank is my essence."
"The girls were stunned by what they heard. They could not have thought that there could be so much of it."
S "A-are you kidding me?"
L "B-but, she'll have to... it... all..."
"Protos swallowed the liquid that had accumulated in her mouth in surprise."
G "More precisely, it's its... special protective mechanism."
"The girl no longer tried to hide her surprise. She looked at the pool with wide-open eyes and really wanted to find out exactly how the seed could protect the essence."
S "Elaborate..."
G "I came up with this a long time ago..."

G "Since we are... we move at our own pace, we are subject to frequent occupation. This puts the safety of the essence in danger, so I decided that it would be better to separate myself from it and store it in the most inaccessible place."
L "In the seed??? Really???"
S "I'm more interested in how you filled this 'safe place'!"
S "No, no, no, wait, I've changed my mind. I definitely don't want to know. I blurted that out without thinking..."
G "It was a brilliant decision: even if I was captured, the capturers would not get any essence. This means that all the time they spent hunting me amounted to nothing."
G "And who could even imagine that a Zerg would, of his own free will, leave his essence behind?"
G "But looking at the situation now, I see that this really creates a certain problem..."
G "Did I imagine that one day a Terran who had befriended a protoss would come, undergo a mutation, and I would gladly give her my essence?"
G "Definitely not."
S "Yeah, agreed..."
G "In fact, we should be glad that we have any way to get it at all. After all, one of the ideas I had was to seal it forever, but that would be tantamount to my death."
S "Not the first time I've heard that."
G "Anyway, inside this tank is a clot of my essence, which you just need to find and absorb."
S "What???"
G "The rest of the tank doesn't contain anything. Besides my seed."
S "Oh really? Haven't I already worked hard enough for this? Do I still have to search for a tiny clot in the middle of a pool of sperm???"
"Sarah looked down resignedly and did not see the bottom of the reservoir. The last thing she was interested in was the feeling of being completely immersed in sperm."
S "Well... it will be a difficult swim."
S "What do you think, Lizzara?"
"The Protoss seemed to come out of a trance, looking away from the strongly smelling liquid."
L "Me? What? Oh, dear..."
S "Well, yes, I used to react exactly the same way as you. Well, get used to it, darling. It happens all the time."
S "(Damn, why does this amuse me...)"
G "I have a thought."
G "We'll hang you upside down and lower you. All you have to do is find the essence and be done with it."
L "M-maybe I should do it? You've done so much already. It'll be fine!"
L "Surely there won't be any more monsters there?"
S "(Heh, she's so cute. Despite the shock, she still wants to climb into the tank instead of me...)"
S "Unlikely..."

S "Even if you find it, my personal experience tells me that the essence is very fragile... I don't even know how to explain it to you. It's something that can't just be given over to someone by hand."
S "Only those who have tasted can comprehend..."
G "I didn't expect anything else from you, so that's why I planned to tie your hands."
L "Wh-what? Tie your hands???"
S "I didn't even expect anything else."
S "Don't worry, Lizzara, I'm not so tired that I can't handle it."
S "As for tying and lowering into the tank... that's for a reason. Right, Guardian?"
G "Yes, this seed is very viscous and if you dive into it, you might not swim back up."
"Lizzara turned pale and clutched the girl's hand. Sarah only covered her hand soothingly."
G "So you must be secured above it. By the way, Lizzara will be able to help us here. She will be responsible for your immersion. And the rise, of course."
S "Oh, well, that's great. Do you hear, Lizzara? You had a job for us, and you were worried."
L "Y-yes! Of course I'll do it. I won't disappoint!"
S "Don't worry, if there's anyone I trust here, it's you!"
S "Being completely immersed in sperm... I'm not even sure how I feel about it."
S "Hmm, I just had an idea. What if I try to get it using my psionic abilities?"
"Sarah raised her hand, smiling snidely."
G "It won't work. The essence is not something so material that it can be moved. And its structure is not much different from the other liquids."
G "It was placed there for protection, not entertainment. And I excel at protecting them. I am a guardian, after all."
S "{size=-4}So that's why we had to restore the spire, because you excel at protecting, right...{/size}"
S "Eh, same old, same old, not a moment of peace for me... when all of this ascending stuff is over, I must go on a vacation for at least a month!"
"Sarah stretched her neck and arms, preparing for the upcoming trial."

"The guard and his subordinates were running around, preparing for the upcoming procedure. They secured the girl with extreme care and lifted her into the air. No one wanted to provoke the wrath of the mighty Sarah."
L "Are you sure you're going to be okay?"
S "Huh? This? Don't worry, it's nothing. You're standing next to me right now. That's enough."
"Lizzara nodded curtly, moving a little further away so as not to interfere. Her zeal to help hadn't disappeared yet, so she was determined."
S "(I feel the blood rushing to my head... Maybe this way I can figure out how to get this essence faster.)"
S "Okay, land-dwellers, let's go over it again. When I do this, what should you do?"
"Sarah began to move her leg, twitching it slightly from side to side."
L "This is a signal that you need to be pulled out. While this is a trial dive, we will not immerse you completely so that you can look around."
S "That's right, great. Well, now I can be calm that at least I won't be buried here with the essence next to me."
S "You remember, right? I do need to breathe. I'll give the signal in advance, but don't take your sweet time pulling me out."
"Sarah once again decided to get ready, getting her last breaths for a while. Fortunately, this was part of the Ghost training, and they were prepared for a variety of tasks."
S "Well, then, full immersion, captain. Lower me down."

"Sarah felt just a little worried. Although she was confident in her abilities, she did not fully believe in the zerg. They abruptly dropped her down, the warm air making the cool seed feel even colder on her skin, although they lowered her only to her shoulders."

"The temperature difference had a seemingly huge effect on; her skin, and her nipples seemed more sensitive than before. Thoughts of the essence momentarily faded into the background, leaving a lot of questions and new sensations in their place."
S "(O-okay, follow the p-plan. I'll dip the guard in here later.)"
S "(First I need to do this...)"
"Sarah concentrated, preparing for something. After a short pause, her eyes began to glow and she was able to open them."
S "(Great, we all know what happens if this sperm gets into my eyes... I'll just go blind.)"
"It was a great idea: using the psi force to make a protective layer for her eyes. Now the girl could actually see what was going on."
"The picture before her open eyes was cloudy, but Sarah remembered perfectly well how bright the essence glowed."
S "(Yeah, it's rather opaque...)"
S "(Is he sure it's here? I can't see even a hint of its presence...)"
"Sarah turned her head, trying to look around, but the picture did not change before her eyes."
S "(If it's here, I must be able to see it, right...)"
S "(Okay, enough for the first time... It seems harder to hold my breath in than usual...)"
"The girl was confused by the fact that everything was not going smoothly. She made a decision and was ready to surface, so she kicked her leg."
S "(D-damn, are they kidding?)"
S "(Why is there no reaction?)"
S "(Hell, no! I'm running out of air!)"

"As her worry grew, Sarah involuntarily let some oxygen-less air out. She realized that the air bubbles would be an additional signal that she needed to be taken out, so she began to release all the contents of her lungs through her mouth."
"The liquid was very viscous but easily flowed into the open mouth, filling it up completely in moments. The girl tried to swallow it, but that turned out to be rather difficult."
"The ropes tightly encircling her body only inflamed her imagination. She imagined herself from the outside, so vulgar, tied up and swallowing sperm."
S "Bwahahaha..."

"As abruptly as Sarah was dunked into the pool, she was pulled out. The girl didn't even have time to realize she was finally being rescued, because it happened almost instantly. The unconsumed sperm flowed out of her half-open mouth, putting Sarah in an even more awkward position."
"Lizzara darted from side to side in fright, exhaling joyfully when she saw Sarah."
S "You..."
S "YOU!!!"
S "Why the hell did you keep me there for so long? I almost..."
S "I gave you a signal! How dare you even...!"
G "I told you it wasn't a cramp!"
L "I'm sorry, Sarah... It really looked like a cramp..."
G "The rope twitched so often that our mistake is not surprising."
S "Oh really? Or maybe I was moving because I needed to find something in this sperm tank. Do you have any idea how hard it is?!"
"Sarah furrowed her brows angrily, realizing that she was on the verge of failure."
L "It won't happen again. I'm sorry."
S "No need to apologize. Just do it right next time!"
G "And the bubbles seemed to mean something else entirely."
S "It was an emergency!"
S "Because of you, I had to swallow this stuff! Do you want to experience what it's like?!"
S "My throat still hurts because of the viscous sperm that got stuck in it..."
S "You're definitely going in here after me!"
G "Enough of that, did you manage to get used to it there?"
S "You didn't even warn me it would be so hard to swallow!"
"Sarah looked indignant, although deep down the unpleasant sensations further stimulated her. She wanted to look serious in front of her future subordinates and not show her utterly perverted side."
G "Who knew you'd want to open your mouth? I'm not good at seeing the future."
S "It's a pity, otherwise you would have already seen me drown you in here..."
G "Well, are you ready for the second round?"
S "Wait! Give me a second to catch my breath..."
S "Br... No one warned me that it was so cold either!"
G "We don't have time to rest! We lowered it!"
L "Come on, Sarah, do your best!"

"Sarah has submerged in the pool again. Her body didn't even have time to dry off slightly before she was submerged again. At least the temperature wasn't as much of a shock this time and the girl was ready for it."
"Vulgar thoughts still came to her, but she tried to drive them away. Sarah was very on edge."
S "(I DIDN'T SAY I HAD TIME TO CATCH MY BREATH! I'LL KILL YOU!)"
S "(I need to try to tilt my head... The pool is deep. It could be at the very bottom. Perhaps its density is different from the cum's.)"

"After some struggling, the girl looked at the bottom of the reservoir. At first, it seemed to her that there was nothing there because the liquid blocked her view too much. But, looking a little closer, Sarah's eyes caught a barely perceptible glow."
S "Here it is!!!"
S "(No, not now!)"

"Upon discovering her goal, the girl forgot where she was for a moment, and again swallowed a large amount of sperm. The viscous goo got stuck inside her throat and caused a coughing fit, making Sarah swallow more and more semen. As her stomach filled up, a pleasant feeling began to spread through her body."
S "Ahem..."
S "(This... Somewhat resembles the nutrient fluid. Exciting, but not so much...)"
"The girl felt hornier and hornier, not quite paying attention to her surroundings. Even when she was pulled out, she did not immediately begin to breathe."
L "Sarah, breathe in!"
S "*Deep breath*"
S "Ahem... I... Did not..."
L "What happened there? The rope didn't move, but there were bubbles."
S "(I SAID, I DIDN'T GIVE THE SIGNAL!)"
"Sarah couldn't speak, so she decided to use telepathy to express her dissatisfaction."
S "I saw... the essence, and at that moment... guess what?"
S "You got me out... it seems to me that you have gathered here just to get in the way!"
S "Shit!"
S "As a result, I swallowed even more than the first time. At this rate, this pool will soon be gone."
S "I'll get to the essence just like that..."
G "It's unlikely. Your stomach can't handle that."
S "I don't even want to argue with that."
S "Okay, getting me out was actually a good idea."
S "Because we have a problem. The essence is almost at the bottom of the pool, so I need to be lowered further."
L "Further???"
G "Are you sure? The lower, the more dangerous. As the density of the liquid and the pressure increase, you may lose consciousness."
L "Sarah, maybe you shouldn't?"
S "Do what I said!"
"Lizzara did not argue, commanding a drive to a more dangerous depth."
"Sarah noticed the longer lowering time. They did not risk lowering her quickly, so as not to create unnecessary pressure drops."
S "(Come on, hurry up...)"
S "(I will never go down like that...)"
S "(Stopped? Already?)"
"Sarah looked down, realizing that the essence was still far away, though a little closer than before."
S "(Did it... Did it move a little?)"
S "(They might've lowered me in a slightly different spot... But it's still weird.)"
S "(If it also moves, then I'll be stuck here forever.)"
S "(But if I let out some air... Should I go lower?)"
S "(A few bubbles shouldn't get me hoisted back up.)"
S "(There is only one way to find out!)"

"Sarah mentally prepared for the opportunity to swallow sperm. Her head got a little foggy and everything that was happening stopped being so serious. She began to release bubbles little by little, rejoicing at approaching the bottom of the pool."
S "(Okay, that worked, the rope's not tensioned, since I can go lower. That's good, but I'm not sure if it's enough.)"

"Having lost her vigilance, the girl missed the moment when her mouth began to fill with semen. It was impossible not to swallow it, but the desire to resist quickly disappeared. Memories of the food tentacle came to mind, and especially of how it turned her on..."
S "(It's not food... That liquid tingled and acted instantly. This one is softer and more delayed...)"
"Sarah began to get used to the density, swallowing more and more liquid. It seemed like she was starting to get a taste until she was yanked out."
G "I'm afraid to even ask why the contents of the pool began to deplete."
S "I... I need to get to the essence somehow, hic. You're not lowering me deep enough!"
S "What's your problem, anyway? After I absorb your essence, there will be no need for this tank anymore!"
"Lizzara giggled in embarrassment, looking at her red-faced and wet friend. Sarah looked quite content, easing the protoss's worries a bit."
G "Okay, okay, it's just that I've been filling it up for so long... It took so long, it's like my life is passing before my eyes with every sip you take..."
S "(Oh dear God, did he really just say that...)"
S "You better worry about me so that I get it faster."
S "Great, I'm ready! Lower me down!"
G "We'll take the risk, but the responsibility is all on you."
"Sarah could still hear the guard's displeased yapping. Like, he filled it for a reason, not for someone to just drink it, even after diving into it. But she didn't care."
S "(Now I'm finally close enough! My precious little one!!!)"
S "(W-what? It really moved?!)"
C "(I knew it.)"
S "(Sai'mon?)"
C "(Yes, I had a free minute, so I decided to analyze what was happening.)"
S "(Damn, don't show up so abruptly.)"
C "(Believe me, when I 'woke up', I was surprised at the situation you were in.)"
C "(So, the density of the liquid plays an important role. When you swallow it, it creates faint vibrations that the essence seems to react to.)"
S "(Sai'mon, do you really think now is the best time for your lectures?)"

C "(It senses these fluctuations and starts moving. Deeper or to the side. Any object, especially one lighter than the substance in which it is located, will be susceptible to fluctuations from any interaction with the substance.)"
S "(Why doesn't it rise higher if I swallow this liquid?)"
C "(Good question, but don't forget, this is a defense mechanism. The guardian could've foreseen this.)"
C "(I think you have to be close for it to work that way. Right now, you are at a distance that will push everything away from you with this flow.)"
S "(This is terrible... I'll never get it that way.)"
S "(Damn, I need to get out. There's not enough air anymore.)"
S "Guardian!"
S "Why do I go down and see the essence in a different place each time?"
S "Sai'mon talked about some kind of pressure... fluctuations."
G "Mmmmm..."
G "Hmmmmm..."
S "Hmm???"
G "He's right about something. I did everything to ensure that the essence was as safe as possible. More precisely, the 'reservoir' is designed so that any trick plays against the invaders."
G "You can't just get it. It is necessary to get as close to it as possible, and that is difficult."
G "If you act cunningly, then it will move further away from the source of the disturbance."
G "BUT there is one vulnerability."
S "Vulnerability??? Are you telling me about it just now?"
L "Guardian! It's very not nice of you to treat Sarah like this!"
G "That's not the point. I really forgot. Do you think creators always remember all the subtleties of their creations?"
S "We'll discuss your cover-up later. Tell me the vulnerability already."
G "Initially, it stays in one place - that is, it is static."
G "As soon as it is in danger, the mechanism to move it initializes. At first, it will move slightly, barely perceptible from a distance, just to mess with the intruder a bit."

G "But after some time, it will completely change its position. Each time it will move faster and further. This is due to the frequent diving. The fact that you swallow the contents of the pool, of course, affects this, but not by a lot."
G "No living being can stay there for a long time, and the more dives, the faster and more often the essence moves."
G "Therefore, you can't stay here for a long time, otherwise it will float away, and you won't see it."
G "But it has limitations. It can't move outside of this pool!"
S "Cool, that's cool information, as if I didn't know that."
S "You! You!!!"
S "Just a second... Where's Lizzara?"
G "Your girlfriend? She suddenly ran away. She said to wait for her when we got you out."
G "Is she always this weird?"
S "She's not weird!"
G "It's the first time I've seen someone so eager to help."
S "She doesn't help everyone."
G "What a pity... I would take advantage of such kindness, heh."
"Sarah felt Lizzara's approach and got distracted from the conversation. The Protoss looked very excited and was shaking something in her hand."
L "Help! I can help you!"
S "What happened? They say you ran off..."
L "Here! I noticed that you are spending less and less time down there. The last time I was here, you were down there for half as long as the time before that! And I remembered!"
"Lizzara was holding a familiar thing for Sarah. For the rest, it was just a pile of plastic, but the girl was smiling contentedly, looking at her."
S "Oh, it's a clock! Where did you find such a rarity on this ship?"
"Lizzara hesitated a little, blushing."
L "I heard Stukov was running around with this... Clock? He was mumbling something enthusiastically about time, the past, and his homeland."
L "I remembered them and thought that they would somehow help me calculate the time."
S "Great, this is just the thing! They look like very old clocks... used by my ancient ancestors, but someone modified them and added a digital dial. I think they were just called 'alarm clocks'!"
L "And we can set the time to get you out. You won't have to give any signals!"
"The guardian observed the enthusiastic girls with restrained surprise."
G "Yeah, yeah, that's all great. You dive, we set up this thing. A clock or whatever it is."
S "Enough talking!"
S "There is no time to waste!"
L "How long should I set the timer for?"

S "Hmm, let me think. It seems to me there must be some kind of pattern here. If the guardian says that I have less time for each dive, then it could be halved each time, but how long was the first dive?"
L "Thirty seconds. I think we can start from that and see where it goes."
S "Great, then I'll dive in and see how long it takes for the essence to start moving again."
"*Gurgle*"
"Now Lizzara's task was to raise Sarah strictly according to the time that was set on the clock."
L "Surely she can handle it. What do you think?"
G "Well, I'll be honest, she figured out my defense mechanism very quickly. She learned the principle of its operation so quickly that our chances are very high."
L "Yes, I was surprised too. Sarah is so devoted to her work, regardless of what is required of her... she's not afraid of anything."
G "It's hard to argue with that."

"Lizzara randomly shifted her gaze from the clock to the pool with Sarah sticking out of it and back, counting down every second. For her, time flowed in a completely different way. A second seemed like an eternity, and all because of her worries about her friend."
L "(Come on, Sarah, hold on, you will succeed. You can handle it.)"
"Ten seconds left on the clock."
L "Is she all right there?"
G "We will find out very soon."
L "Ha? Wh-what is it? Is the time up?"
G "The alarm clock kept ringing, which meant only one thing: it was time to get Sarah out."
"I haven't seen such technology before, but I think so!"
S "Bwaa-a-a-a-a-a-a-ah!"
S "Great! We almost guessed the time correctly."
"There was a satisfied smile on the girl's face."
S "This alarm clock is exactly like the old ones: loud and annoying as hell."
S "I heard the clock ring right as it moved, which means that the time was almost perfect. Well, maybe give or take a couple of seconds."
L "Great, then how much are we reducing it by?"
S "Put it on for fifteen, I'll only have fifteen seconds to absorb it."
S "(It has never been so close to me before. This time I will definitely absorb it...)"
S "(The longer we mess around, the further it floats away...)"
L "The time is set, we are ready!"
S "Lower me!"
"The girl took a huge gulp of air and puffed out her cheeks, realizing that this time she would not have to stay in the sperm for long, so the preparation was extremely fast."
"Sarah left the guardian and Lizzara alone again, continuing her attempts to catch the essence. She had a lot less time for this attempt."
L "With each new dive, it all becomes so... exciting."
G "Oh, how exciting it is for me! I don't even know how to put it into words. I'm floating here and looking at a Terran trying to bypass the protection I created and absorb my essence."
G "And the strangest thing is that I am helping this Terran in every possible way."
L "But you're doing a good thing. Sarah helped you, you helped Sarah. That was your deal."
L "You're not thinking of cheating Sarah and stealing the essence from her, are you?"
G "Is that what you think of me? If I have given my word, I will keep it. Do you know how many times I've broken my word in my life?"
L "Not once, maybe?"
G "That's right, and I'm not changing that statistic."
"Lizzara smiled contentedly, completely forgetting about Sarah, completely absorbed in the conversation."
L "I'm glad to hear that. I really feel your determination."
G "Uh, yeah, you can't take that away from me."
L "I am very glad that Sarah is surrounded by creatures like you."
G "Believe me, girl, not everyone here is like me. Many may not keep their word."
L "Then I'm doubly glad since you won't leave Sarah alone."
"The cute conversation was interrupted by the loud alarm clock, which meant only one thing."
L "Time's up, it's time to get Sarah!"
G "According to my calculations, there is not much time left. Get a good breath!"
S "W-what...?"
S "No, wait! It..."
S "*Gurgle*"
"Without giving her a chance to say a word, Sarah was immediately put back into the tank."
L "Em... Did we do the right thing? She wanted to tell us something."
G "From my experience, if the last attempt was 15 seconds long, now there are only a couple of seconds left. This means there's no time for chatter. I'm sure she almost caught it."
L "Well, your words make sense."
L "But I didn't even have time to set the alarm. How do we know when she will need to be taken out?"
G "Just wait a couple of seconds, and get her out."
G "Maybe a couple more to be sure."
L "Now?"
G "No, no, no, it's not time yet."
G "Now!"
"Lizzara, along with the guardian, lifts Sarah. As soon as they finish, they see a disgruntled face."
S "It moved, yes. This is what I wanted to say at the moment when you dunked me..."
L "Ouch!"
G "This can't be happening! We had calculated everything. There was enough time for one more dive."
S "Yeah-yeah-yeah, now tell me, did you do that on purpose to interfere with my efforts?"
G "No."
"The guardian looked away in guilt, not even realizing how that betrayed his intentions."
S "Why don't I believe you?!"
L "(That bastard... He was just... sweet-talking me.)"
S "Okay, your little prank has robbed me of time. The essence has changed its location."
L "Oops..."
S "But you're lucky, I noticed it. That was enough time for me, and now I know in which direction to move."
L "So now you'll only have thirty seconds?"
S "Even less, it happened literally a couple of seconds before the ringing."
L "Got you, but we'd better give you thirty seconds anyway."
S "(Well, that's it. This time you definitely won't escape me!)"
"Sarah knew the location of the essence and that the movement this time wouldn't be great. Now she only had to reach it."
S "(You were here somewhere, which means you should be...)"
S "(Is someone messing with me?)"
S "(Damn, it's like I'm a fish hunting for my prey, my hands tied... Now where would I have a fin...)"
S "(Okay, no time for jokes, time to get it over with.)"

"Sarah slowly moved in the direction of the essence. She clearly saw it but was not close enough to absorb it. But everything would be fine if it weren't for a lot of factors that complicated this task."
S "(Slow and smooth, no unnecessary movements, just a little more. You're already mine.)"
"Sarah was rarely this focused on something, especially considering there was a very large amount of sperm around her, trying to penetrate all her holes."
S "(W-what, so fast? This can't be. Was I too slow? So focused on the search...)"
S "(It's right in front of me! Another couple of seconds...)"
"Time seemed to run at a different pace for Sarah. She barely noticed the time passing, and now she was being dragged out again."
S "Damn you!"
S "Even less time! Lower me."
L "B-but you're just..."
S "IMMEDIATELY!"
G "Fifteen seconds!"
S "*Gurgle*"
G "Wow, she was quite aggressive..."
L "I'm getting more and more worried about her..."
S "(This goes beyond all possible limits of what is allowed...)"
S "(Come here, little essence!)"
S "(If I can't do it right now... then next time I won't for sure.)"
"As soon as the dive was over, the girl, without having time to open her eyes, noticed a bright glow that could not be confused with anything."
"This time, luck turned to her."
S "Oh, yes! You're mine! MINE!!!"

"Sarah felt tingling anticipation from the top of her head to the tips of her toes, completely forgetting that she was still inside a tank full of semen. Her chest tightened just from the view of the essence that would bring her strength and a new unforgettable orgasm."
S "(It's so close, it's driving me crazy.)"

"This time, the power from the essence seemed older, time-tested, titanic, and unbending. Sarah felt different, with no mind-blowing euphoria. Instead, every cell in her body seemed to relish gaining this essence."
L "The tank began to glow so brightly, did she..."
G "I can't believe my eyes, she did it..."

"The guardian, along with Lizzara, were completely captivated by the spectacle that opened up to them. It was something unimaginable, they hadn't even fully realized what Sarah had managed to do yet."
G "She surpassed my creation... Overcame it so fast..."
L "Yes, she did it! Hee-hee-hee, I'm so glad!"
L "It's so beautiful!"
"Lizzara was ready to jump with happiness. It seemed as if she had managed to absorb that essence. Lizzara was very sincere with her emotions."
G "I think now is the time to get her out. I doubt the essence allows her to live without air..."
L "Oh! Right, I need to get her. How could I forget!"
"The moment the girls were taken out of the tank, they did not make a single sound or sigh, which, of course, caused the protoss to worry."
G "So she is dead after all."
L "N-no... This can't be happening... She spent a lot more time there than on previous dives!"
L "S-Sarah! SARAH! WAKE UP! COME ON!"
"Sarah heard a buzzing, annoying voice somewhere very far away, but as time passed, it began to get closer."
S "(What is...)"
"The girl began to return to reality but still did not want to open her eyes and part with the haze of sensations."
S "(...That annoying noise!)"
L "A-alive!!! SHE'S ALIVE! I told you!"
"Sarah felt someone hugging her tightly and sobbing softly. Lizzara was ready to lose consciousness from the overabundance of emotions."
S "And why should I be dead?"
"Sarah finally opened her eyes, looking at the guardian peeking over the protoss's shoulder."
G "Y-you weren't even breathing! We've been waiting for you for so long that we pulled you out... And you weren't breathing!"
G "Do you know what I've been through?"
S "I don't know... But maybe you want to hear what I've been through?"
S "The most wonderful feelings in life..."
G "We'll definitely talk about it sometime."
S "I ought to make a list of everything you promised to talk about."
G "(No need to hold so many grudges, really...)"
S "I feel great. Actually, no, even better..."
"Lizzara laughed, looking at her lively and contented friend. Although she was completely covered in semen, Lizzara did not stop hugging the girl."
"Unlike Lizzara, the guardian instead looked at the contents of the tank, a note of sadness in his gaze, as if part of his life had ended in that tank just recently."
G "(Just a couple of minutes ago, you were a necessity, and now you're just a reservoir of semen...)"
G "All right! I think it's time to finish all this. Let's untie you and get you out of here."
S "A really good idea. My hands are already starting to go numb..."
"Sarah only laughed softly, slowly moving her stiff limbs."
S "(What a beautiful day. What a wonderful victory.)"
